io.dropwizard.client

Class JerseyClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.client.HttpClientConfiguration
      • io.dropwizard.client.JerseyClientConfiguration

  • public class JerseyClientConfiguration
extends HttpClientConfiguration
    The configuration class used by JerseyClientBuilder. Extends HttpClientConfiguration.
    See Also:
    HttpClientConfiguration, Jersey Client Configuration
